name: Tarot for Storytelling
description:
“Tarot For Storytelling” – it's instrument for game designers, writers, screen writers, dungeon masters and other storytellers. It's based on Tarot cards interpritation and various systems of creating stories.

Now avalible version which has the following plot architectures:
  • 2 Card – help you build a connection between two characters or events;
  • 3 Cards – help you build a connection between three characters or events, as well as build the emphasis of the three acts of your story;
  • 3 Cards – help you build a connection between four characters or events;
  • Five Whys - builds a sequence of events that led to this;
  • Hero Cross – will help you create a full-fledged character of the character with his past, gift, curse, dream and his Shadow.

In future versions, I plan to add the function of building story chains according to the principles: "Harmon's Circle", "The Hero's Journey", as well as add other useful functionality like editing the history window and saving it on your device.
